doc.field: Thomas N. Schroth and Raymond A. Schroth, S.J. Brooklyn Eagle collection
Thomas N. Schroth and Raymond A. Schroth, S.J. Brooklyn Eagle collection
Series 1: Thomas N. Schroth Brooklyn Eagle records
Series 1: Thomas N. Schroth Brooklyn Eagle records

This series is located in Record Cartons 1 and 2, as well as Oversize Boxes 3 and 4, and contains the papers and records of Thomas N. Schroth, the last managing editor of the Brooklyn Eagle. The materials include scrapbooks, bound first and centennial issues, and Eagle publications such as pamphlets and booklets. The bulk of this series is comprised of materials documenting the protracted labor struggle between newspaper management and the Eagle unit of the Newspaper Guild during the years 1952 to 1955, consisting mainly of correspondence, internal memos, clippings, Newspaper Guild publications, Guild meeting bulletins, and union contracts. The condition of the items in this series ranges from very poor (clippings and typescripts on poor quality paper) to good (the more recent materials and all correspondence on onionskin paper). Folders are arranged in alphabetical order by subject.
